title: Silver’s history points to why it is back in record territory
summary: Gold demand has spilled over to the white metal, which also acts as insurance in times of turbulence

title: China’s Battery Giants Flood Overseas Markets As Exports Surge 220%
summary: Last year, China's battery industry average utilization rate cratered to just a third of maximum capacity amid severe overcapacity following years of massive investment and expansion. title: Ecuador’s Declining Oil Output Threatens to Spark an Economic Crisis
summary: The last decade has been especially grueling for Ecuador’s economically vital oil industry. title: E-Waste Per Capita: Europe Leads the World
summary: Every person in the world generates on average around 8 kilograms of electronic waste per year worldwide. However, there are significant regional differences.
